newsitem.title: UK: UK regulator says Winchester scaling down activity.
newsitem.headline: UK regulator says Winchester scaling down activity.

text.p: Winchester Brokerage, part of the Winchester Commodities Group has informed the UK regulator the Securities and Futures Authority (SFA) that it intends to scale down its operations in metal trading.
A spokesman for Winchester Commodities could say only that "We have not finalised any decisions as to our future."
An SFA spokesman said, "Winchester Brokerage have told us that they have notified their staff that they are scaling down their operations."
"This is a retrenchment because of a downturn in the metals market and what Winchester described as negative publicity attached to that organisation," the SFA spokesman said.
"Winchester has kept us (SFA) fully informed of their thoughts and plans throughout," he said.
